title: Thailand
heading: Data Collection & Field Services in Thailand (Nationwide):
list: Coverage: Bangkok + regional teams across Chiang Mai, Chiang Rai, Phuket, Pattaya, Khon Kaen, Hat Yai, Nakhon Ratchasima.
Languages: Thai & regional dialects; English for B2B/HCP.
QC & Compliance: 100% back-checks on critical items, random checks elsewhere, GPS/time-stamps, consented recordings, GDPR-aware processes; additional safeguards for child/youth research.
Outputs: field status trackers, quota & incidence reports, respondent profiles, audio/video files, and set-up photos (where applicable).
